name: Alien Invasion (itch)
description:
The aliens invaded the space. You are the only hope. Hop in your ship and save the humanity!

_____________________________________________________________

Controls:

Use the mouse to move!

_____________________________________________________________

Update Log:

v 0.2 :

Bug fixes

v 0.3 :

Added some money at game start

Fixed a bug

Added a new ship!

Added new type of bullets (weaker, but faster!)

Added the ability to buy ships

v 0.4 :

More money at the start of the game

Now the game saves your progress then you close it

Added the ability to reset progress

Now the game shows the price of the second ship

Changed the name of the "Next" button to "Hangar"
